hero.title: MedX Laboratory
hero.subtitle: Building trustworthy and accessible medical AI, focusing on large language model technologies to empower clinical decision-making and medical research

about.title: About the Lab
about.description1: MedX is jointly established by AI researchers and medical researchers from Peking University and the University of Edinburgh, collaborating with top-tier hospitals including Peking University Cancer Hospital and Peking University Third Hospital.
about.description2: We focus on large language model technologies to empower clinical decision-making and medical research, creating a complete loop from clinical needs to technology development to practical applications.

areas.ehr: Precision Medicine Prediction Based on EHR
areas.ehrDesc: Building clinically verifiable, highly trustworthy, and interpretable deep learning frameworks
areas.llmDesc: Constructing knowledge bases with both individual clinical EHR data and medical expert experience
areas.platform: LLM-Driven AI for Science Research Platform
areas.platformDesc: Breaking down barriers for medical researchers in AI technology applications

director.name: Liantao Ma
director.title: Lab Director
director.description: Research Assistant Professor at the National Engineering Research Center for Software Engineering, Peking University. Long-term engagement in medical informatics and interpretable deep learning analysis of electronic health record data.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for collaborations and opportunities
contact.recruitment: We are always looking for talented researchers and students to join our team. Check out our open positions and collaboration opportunities.
contact.address: 5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District, Beijing, Peking University

publications.title: Publications
publications.subtitle: Explore our latest research findings and academic contributions

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed about our latest research breakthroughs, events, and announcements from MedX Lab

1.title: MedX Lab Welcomes New Postdoctoral Researchers
1.summary: We are excited to welcome three new postdoctoral researchers specializing in medical AI and large language models to our team.

2.title: New Publication in Nature Medicine
2.summary: Our research on AI-assisted clinical decision making has been published in Nature Medicine, marking a significant milestone.

3.title: Annual Medical AI Workshop 2024
3.summary: Join us for our annual workshop featuring leading experts in medical AI, discussing the latest developments and challenges.

4.title: Partnership with Peking University Cancer Hospital
4.summary: MedX Lab establishes strategic partnership with Peking University Cancer Hospital for collaborative research on AI in oncology.

5.title: Best Paper Award at ICML 2024
5.summary: Our team received the best paper award at ICML 2024 for our work on interpretable medical AI systems.

6.title: New Lab Facilities Opening
6.summary: MedX Lab expands with new research facilities dedicated to medical AI development and clinical applications.
